Smart AC: Create an air conditioner that can learn your temperature preferences and adjust accordingly. This smart AC can also recognize your daily routine and adjust the temperature accordingly, so you don't have to manually adjust it every day. It can also be controlled through a smartphone app, allowing you to adjust the temperature from anywhere in the world.

Portable AC: Design an air conditioner that is lightweight and portable, making it easy to take with you on the go. This portable AC can be powered by a rechargeable battery, allowing you to use it anywhere without worrying about finding an outlet. It can also be easily stored in a small space when not in use.

Air Purifier: Create an air conditioner that not only cools the air but also purifies it. This air purifier can remove pollutants, allergens, and other harmful particles from the air, providing a healthier environment for you and your family. It can also be equipped with a built-in humidifier to add moisture to the air, making it more comfortable and easier to breathe.

Air Conditioner with Built-In Speakers: Design an air conditioner that has built-in speakers, allowing you to listen to your favorite music or podcasts while cooling your home. This air conditioner can also be connected to your smartphone or tablet, allowing you to control the music and the temperature with just a few taps on your device.

Self-Cleaning AC: Create an air conditioner that can clean itself, eliminating the need for manual cleaning. This self-cleaning AC can use UV light and other technologies to kill bacteria and other microorganisms that can accumulate on the coils and other parts of the air conditioner. It can also be equipped with a smart filter that can detect when it needs to be cleaned and replace itself automatically.
